import React, { useState } from 'react' import {Book} from "../models/book"; export default function BookTable(props) { const [title, setTitle] = useState(''); const [author, setAuthor] = useState(''); const [isbn, setIsbn] = useState(''); function onBookFormSubmit(e) { e.preventDefault(); let book = new Book(title, author, isbn); props.onBookCreated(book); } return

setTitle(e.target.value)}/>
setAuthor(e.target.value)}/>
setIsbn(e.target.value)}/>
}
